warlordsplusplus.title: WarlordsPlusPlus
warlordsplusplus.config.general.title: General
warlordsplusplus.config.scoreboard.title: Scoreboard
Scoreboard Settings
warlordsplusplus.config.scoreboard.scale: The scale of the scoreboard in CTF/TDM
The scale of the scoreboard in DOM
warlordsplusplus.config.scoreboard.showD: Renders the amount of times an enemy an enemy died to you or an ally stole your kill
Renders the amount of damage/healing done/received
warlordsplusplus.config.scoreboard.split: Splits the scoreboard vertically instead of horizontally
warlordsplusplus.config.renderer.title: Renderer
warlordsplusplus.config.renderer.title.t: All things that are rendered in the world
warlordsplusplus.config.renderer.renderP: Cooldown/Energy above players. Only works in PvE or if allowed in PvP
warlordsplusplus.config.chat.title: Chat
warlordsplusplus.config.chat.title.toolt: All things that are printed in the chat
warlordsplusplus.config.chat.printAbilit: Prints stats of all used abilities (Crit Chance) at the end of the game
warlordsplusplus.config.chat.printGenera: Prints general stats (Damage/Healing/Energy/Deaths/...) at the end of the game
warlordsplusplus.config.chat.printScoreb: Prints a snapshot of the custom scoreboard along with flag information at the end of the game
